tool_description: Monitors competitor pricing for specified products and tracks price changes over time.

target_products.description: Products to monitor competitor prices for

competitor_ids.description: List of competitor identifiers to monitor

monitoring_frequency.description: How often to check prices: hourly, daily, weekly

error_messages: Invalid monitoring frequency: use hourly, daily, or weekly
Competitor access denied: unable to access pricing data for one or more competitors
Product not found: one or more target_products could not be located in competitor catalogs
Rate limit exceeded: monitoring frequency too high for available API limits
usage: Provide target_products and competitor_ids arrays, optionally set monitoring_frequency to control how often prices are checked.

price_changes_detected.description: Number of price changes found since last check
